restaurant.user_domain: I need marketing help for my restaurant. I want to attract more local diners, increase takeout/delivery orders, and build a loyal customer base who comes back regularly.
restaurant.user_framing: Focus on small restaurants with limited budgets ($500-2500/month). Prioritize practical tactics over theory. I'm not a marketing expert - make it actionable.

retail_store.user_domain: I need marketing help for my brick-and-mortar retail store. I want to drive foot traffic, compete with online shopping and big box stores, and increase average transaction value.
retail_store.user_framing: Focus on independent retail shops, not chains. Budget-conscious approach. Need to track ROI on every dollar spent.

professional_services.user_domain: I need marketing help for my professional services business (lawyer, accountant, consultant, financial advisor). I want to attract high-quality clients and establish thought leadership.
professional_services.user_framing: Focus on solo practitioners and small firms. Limited time for marketing. Need strategies that build trust and credibility.

ecommerce.user_domain: I need marketing help for my e-commerce store. I want to increase conversion rates, reduce cart abandonment, improve customer lifetime value, and compete with Amazon.
ecommerce.user_framing: Focus on small e-commerce businesses. Budget-conscious paid advertising. Need to optimize every step of the funnel.

local_services.user_domain: I need marketing help for my local service business (plumber, electrician, cleaner, landscaper, handyman). I want to get more local leads and build a strong reputation.
local_services.user_framing: Focus on owner-operator businesses. Very limited marketing budget. Need to leverage free/low-cost channels effectively.
